## Description {#details}

This file defines the &#39;Statistic&#39; class, which is designed to be an easy way to expose various metrics from passes.

These statistics are printed at the end of a run (from llvm&#95;shutdown), when the -stats command line option is passed on the command line.

This is useful for reporting information like the number of instructions simplified, optimized or removed by various transformations, like this:

static Statistic NumInstsKilled(&quot;gcse&quot;, &quot;Number of instructions killed&quot;);

Later, in the code: ++NumInstsKilled;

NOTE: Statistics <em>must</em> be declared as global variables.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t PrevMax = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trackingstatistic/#a35551bf997b08d95de945a32e1b9ad6b">Value</a>.load(std::memory&#95;order&#95;relaxed);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep trying to update max until we succeed or another thread produces</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a bigger max than us.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (V &gt; PrevMax &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trackingstatistic/#a35551bf997b08d95de945a32e1b9ad6b">Value</a>.compare&#95;exchange&#95;weak(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;STATS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6412c3ea6550f1aeab7571b6d38a2bf3">Statistic</a> = TrackingStatistic;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6412c3ea6550f1aeab7571b6d38a2bf3"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6412c3ea6550f1aeab7571b6d38a2bf3">Statistic</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/noopstatistic">NoopStatistic</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// STATISTIC - A macro to make definition of statistics really simple.  This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// automatically passes the DEBUG&#95;TYPE of the file into the statistic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166" lineLink="#ad6117415b93e5675d5a6c8e1855b3b2f"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define STATISTIC(VARNAME, DESC)                                               \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">  static llvm::Statistic VARNAME = &#123;DEBUG&#95;TYPE, #VARNAME, DESC&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ALWAYS&#95;ENABLED&#95;STATISTIC - A macro to define a statistic like STATISTIC but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it is enabled even if LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;STATS is off.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171" lineLink="#a1dbcd375ae3d0b19303f5f48ca1bfce2"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define ALWAYS&#95;ENABLED&#95;STATISTIC(VARNAME, DESC)                                \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">  static llvm::TrackingStatistic VARNAME = &#123;DEBUG&#95;TYPE, #VARNAME, DESC&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Enable the collection and printing of statistics.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5fa843ed7ad4b46e6ba9e284656eab96">EnableStatistics</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DoPrintOnExit = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Check if statistics are enabled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a846137dc22b3b399b62f606698f3ed59">AreStatisticsEnabled</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Print statistics to the file returned by CreateInfoOutputFile().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa5094c6f6a737f5a94596cdab0b2b449">PrintStatistics</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Print statistics to the given output stream.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa5094c6f6a737f5a94596cdab0b2b449">PrintStatistics</a>(raw&#95;ostream &amp;OS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Print statistics in JSON format. This does include all global timers (\\see</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Timer, TimerGroup). Note that the timers are cleared after printing and will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// not be printed in human readable form or in a second call of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// PrintStatisticsJSON().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aec1a19ebf309a206257e212c33f045a1">PrintStatisticsJSON</a>(raw&#95;ostream &amp;OS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Get the statistics. This can be used to look up the value of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// statistics without needing to parse JSON.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function does not prevent statistics being updated by other threads</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// during it&#39;s execution. It will return the value at the point that it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// read. However, it will prevent new statistics from registering until it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// completes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::vector&lt;std::pair&lt;StringRef, uint64&#95;t&gt;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aaf5def081d7ef2cb43fcc6ada7167ef5">GetStatistics</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Reset the statistics. This can be used to zero and de-register the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// statistics in order to measure a compilation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// When this function begins to call destructors prior to returning, all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// statistics will be zero and unregistered. However, that might not remain the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// case by the time this function finishes returning. Whether update from other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// threads are lost or merely deferred until during the function return is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// timing sensitive.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Callers who intend to use this to measure statistics for a single</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// compilation should ensure that no compilations are in progress at the point</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// this function is called and that only one compilation executes until calling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// GetStatistics().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1dee1e2846e883eea571e31bc8fc2d46">ResetStatistics</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LLVM&#95;ADT&#95;STATISTIC&#95;H</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
